Hey,
My name is Aman Yadav

I am currently working on an innovative project that reimagines online dating and community building for urban youth aged 18-25. The platform addresses urban isolation, mental well-being, and the challenges of superficial swiping on traditional dating apps by introducing a community-focused, AI-driven solution. This platform emphasizes anonymity, psychological compatibility, and real-world interactions, aligning with new social media paradigms and mental health aids.

About Me Background in Informatics and Instrumentation.Proven expertise in event planning, team management, and industry collaboration. Strong programming skills in Python, HTML5, CSS, and effective presentations. Enthusiastic learner exploring entrepreneurship and consumer internet, complemented by excellent communication and leadership abilities

More about project

Steps Taken
Empathy Research
I began by conducting empathy research to deeply understand the challenges faced by my target audience—students and professionals in metro cities. This involved surveys, interviews, and empathy mapping to identify key pain points like digital fatigue, the need for meaningful connections, and mental health struggles.

User Persona Development
Based on the research findings, I created detailed user personas to better understand the behaviors, needs, and expectations of the audience. This step was critical in shaping the features and functionalities of the platform.

Concept Validation
I designed and distributed surveys to validate the idea. The responses highlighted the audience’s interest in anonymity-based interaction and community-driven platforms. This feedback has been invaluable in refining the project’s direction.

Feature Ideation and Prototyping
Using the insights gained, I conceptualized the platform’s core features, such as:
Anonymous user interactions to ensure privacy and safety. AI-driven psychological compatibility matching. A focus on mental health support with mindfulness prompts and discussion forums. Reward-based engagement to foster real-world interactions. A wireframe and low-fidelity prototype of the platform were developed, laying the foundation for user testing.

Collaborations and Research
To ensure the solution is well-grounded, I explored academic research on AI’s role in mental wellness. I’m actively seeking partnerships with app developers, UI/UX designers, and experts in AI to accelerate the development of the platform’s MVP.
